issue.title: [CF 975] All data / settings are gone after relog.
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. All data / settings are gone after relog

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect that when I enter the world all addon setting will be saved but instead of it they are gone and each time I relog / enter the world I must to configure all the spells, buffs, cooldowns and procs again and again.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
1.2.5b1 (for 3.3.5)
1.2.4 (for 3.3.3)
I thought that the problem may be caused of "BETA" so I download the elder one but nothing helped.

Do you have an error log of what happened?
NO

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
I'm not sure that it will help but anyways - server I play isn't official one and I'm using ruRU (russian language) of WoW


> Posted by CurseForge user artursofc | Imported from CurseForge issue #975 | Raw
